bio: Our goal is to promote community conversations about innovative regenerative solutions enabled by Web3 technology.
contributionDescription:
Our goal is to promote community conversations about innovative regenerative solutions enabled by Web3 technology.
We have onboarded new people to the optimism ecosystem teaching them how to create a wallet and import the Optimism Network, we also grant them with a few dollars to have the initial funds for gas fees and savings.

contributionLinks.description: Wallet Address we use to onboard people

impactDescription: We have onboarded new people to the optimism ecosystem teaching them how to create a wallet and import the Optimism Network, we also grant them with a few dollars to have the initial funds for gas fees and savings, this new people learn about blockchain using the Optimism network.
